Title: Virus: Virus Buster Serge
Description:
['Neo Hong Kong, 2097: The world has changed. Advances in genetic engineering and cybernetics have created an environment full of artificially enhanced humans and intelligent super-computers that operate using biological software. But the same technology that has allowed man and machine to merge has made both susceptible to a new kind of threatâ€”digital viruses capable of controlling their hosts.', '
